name: MasterCook Recipe
summary: An MZ2 file is a meal recipe created in MasterCook, a program used to record, share, and organize recipes. It contains a list of ingredients needed to create a meal, a list of the steps that must be performed to create that meal, and sometimes, an image of the meal itself. MZ2 files can be used to upload recipes to MasterCook.com.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
